content: A very enjoyable app.
This is a very well put together app. Well worth paying 99cents for the full app. You get alot more shows.
Trusted service for multiple years. I use the pro model
Worked fine for several years updated my phone 2 weeks ago app was workig 5 mins ago now nothing is playing. Everything says stream failed

Ive used this app for several years. Ive overlooked the faults but lately they have gotten annoying. Aspecially as im using the paid version. Frequently hangs or won't load the shows. The app could use better tracking of the last radio show played..

Thank you very much for helping me figure out why the paid app kept closing. This is my favorite app for old radio shows. We did just have an android update. I've cleared cache, deleted and redownload. Restarted my phone, I still get stream failed. Dont know what else to do. Loved this app. Daily listener.

Love the app have had it for years. But now it doesnt work. Keeps saying stream failed. I have uninstalled it and reinstalled it and restarted my phone. I have cleaned the cache still will not work. So irritated and frustrated with it. I put it on every night now i cant.
replyContent: The app hasn't changed in months so something changed on your device. System update? Some kind of network app?

content: Agree with all previous ratings. Best vintage radio collection.
Awesome thank you
To edit my previous review --- Fantastic app! Thanks to the app staff, I found Jack Benny! Thanks for the beautiful app and thanks for all the hard work that was put into it.
replyContent: There should be a notice at the top of the app. Go to the menu and Refresh Content to get the full listing of shows. Jack Benny is in the Comedy section.

content: Love this app. Used to listen to "Couple Next Door" but can't seen to find it in this app. Other than that I think it's great.
I found the show I wanted. I was looking in the wrong area.
replyContent: There are over 32,000 shows from over 350 different series.

content: This app is fantastic and I am personally so very grateful for it. For a free app you can't ask for more, there are so many wonderful radio shows, I would happily pay for this app, or donate. My main suggestion/request is to add a bookmark feature? That way I can listen to other shows and pick up where I left off. Also would really like a 'listen later' list where we can save shows to a list that we favor or want to keep track of. Overall, 6 stars! ðŸ¥°ðŸ–¤ðŸ–¤ðŸ–¤

Update, the app has quit working. You open it up and nothing happens. No previous episode up. Nothing. Love the app, play it every night and go to sleep with it. However i dont set the continues play as it would play ahead 14 episodes. is there anyway to set a shut off timer for say 60min, 90min, or 2 episodes, 3 episodes etc etc? Still a great app!!! as an updated question, there are hundreds of different shows, are there any western themed shows that are closer to an hour long.
replyContent: There is a sleep timer. Set the app for continuous play and start playing the show. Set the sleep timer for how long you want it to run.

content: I have loved this app for such a long time. It's got everything! Since last week sometimes when I click to go into it I just get a totally blank beige screen. I have to go into my applications and delta it and then re-download the app. Really getting to be tedious to have to do that each time I want to listen. If that could be fixed you have a 5 star rating from me! Thank you. It's still happening. App will not open at all. Cant listen at all anymore. :-(
replyContent: This should have been fixed in the last update. Let me know.

content: A stable app that has provided many hours of entertainment. Use almost nightly on Samsung S9+ running P. Highly recommend.

Like many other otr fans I have a sentimental streak, and so I was reluctant to move away from good old reliable old time radio player. However it hasn't been quite as reliable as it used to be so I decided to give this a try. This is the new king of old time radio apps. I won't be going back. Congratulations to the maker of this app. You've dethroned a king.
Luv this app!
replyContent: A network outage (that is out of my control) has been restored.

content: This app needs to be fixed. When you pay for something, it's supposed to work. Your system has developed a bug. I've had the app for several years. And all of a sudden it started turning off after a couple minutes of play. I've tried deleting and replacing. Nothing works. Please repair your app. Thank you
replyContent: Nothing has changed with the app. Did you receive an update for your device? Turn off any battery savings settings for GAOR. Look for any other device apps that try to help with battery saving. Samsung devices are notorious for trying to save battery life.

content: LOVE this app! It has tons of shows and episodes, and the controls are great once you get a hold of em. Would even pay for this app if there was an option. Also, I emailed support with a question, and they responded in a timely manner, and their answer really helped. I definitely recommend this app to fans of old time radio!
I'd give it five stars if it had a feature that let me mark my favorite genres or shows as favorites for quick access.
Love the app. Lots of great shows to choose from and they have a genre for everyone. If you have an issue they are very quick to respond. Highly recommend this app!

This used to be my favorite app for OTR. Now it stops after just a few minutes for every show! I am not sure what happened, but it's been doing it for awhile now. I just got a new phone and it's still doing it. I paid for this app, so hate to De-install it. Hope it gets fixed soon!!! :( UPDATE- I'm not having the problem anymore with the app crashing so thank you for fixing that. However, for many months now, the only way I can get the app to close is by Forcing Stop. Is there a fix?
replyContent: The app hasn't changed in quite a while. Check any battery saving apps or settings and add GAoR to the don't optimize list. When the app notification is displayed at the top of your screen, the app is running. If you exit by the back button, the app will close and the notification will disappear. The app only runs when the notification is displayed

content: Dont waste your money. They might have 3 episodes of each show u want.
replyContent: It sounds like you didn't update the content from the menu. There should have been a pop up stating new content is available. Download it for over 31,000 shows from over 350 different series.

content: Great
Love listening at night to go to sleep ðŸ’¤
Like it
terrific sound quality, the most extensive collection of shows imaginable...nearly 18,000.â€¦easy to use, and an astonishing bargain Far and away tve best vintage tadio app anywhere.
love it
replyContent: I can't duplicate the problem so I'm guessing at the fix. Try version 4.40 to see if that fixes it.

content: love this app
Late in the night, it is a great way to relax and be entertained until you fall asleep.

Love this ap. Have been using it almost everyday. I spend a lot of time driving and this really helps pass the time. However it stopped working last night. I keep getting stream failed notice. Tried to restart ap and restart phone, any advice would be appreciated. Fast response from developer. Issue is resolved. By far the best ap for old radio shows!!
replyContent: Thank you.

content: accept for the past 24 hours of constant stream failures this app is still my favorite app, please fix your problem quickly!
replyContent: A network outage (that is out of my control) has been restored.

content: this app is fun helps me sleep at night
replyContent: Thank you.

content: Needs some updates. Although the selection of stations and shows is great, it could use some updates. Playback controls via notification and on the lock screen, update to a material design, better control of download, etc.
Love this app!
replyContent: Thank you.

content: I love this app! I use it every day at work. I so enjoy listening to these old radio shows, it really helps to pass the time during the work day. Thanks for such a fun app!
thanks for the help... works great again... sorry for the short fuse ;)
replyContent: Thank you.

content: Geat app for those of us stuck in the middle of the century. The last one, of course. Excellent selection of shows, fantastic sound quality, and an extremely responsive developer.
has quit working. says that it is shutting down and it does. still shutting down. uninstalling
replyContent: There is a known issue with Note 4 devices with Android 6. This has been fixed in v4.44.

content: The best OTR app I've ever used ... and I've tried them all.
one of the better otr gatherings.
Hands down, the best OTR app I've used. The amount of shows available for streaming is amazing.

I like the app, but when streaming it starts and plays fine for maybe 10 
min or so then stops. I have to search for the program again, start over 
and try to FF to where it stopped. Very annoying. Does this 3-4 times, 
impossible to listen. Download is ok, only during streaming does it 
lockup/stop.

Like Ed Dalton below, I'm also having a problem with it defaulting to  The Phony Inheritance Racket Pt 03 of Superman (1947)  Otherwise, it's a darn good app.  I love the ability to download shows for when I'm in an airplane or in a dead zone.

This app has stopped working. After enjoying a few shows all I get now is 
failed stream. It is not my connection as I change over to another radio 
app and received it with no problem. Please fix this as it is the best one 
I have found. Thanks

Great app, but recently it started massive battery drain when running in 
background. Wish it would just turn off once it finished playing.

This is definitely one of the better OTR apps available. The selection of 
programs could be larger. The one issue that really bugs me is that 
continuous play mode is useless because the app will always get 1 episode 
stuck in memory that it always wants to play. Every time you start the app 
it wants to play that episode and even if you play the episode all the way 
through that same episode will simply start playing again right after it 
ends.
replyContent: There's not much that I can do regarding the sound quality. It all depends on the original source material and how it was encoded. There's a technical reason on why the menus work the way they do but it may not be as relevant now as it was originally. I'll look into a possibly better method.

content: Problem : Yellow Title... I seem to be locked into one title ALWAYS being colored yellow. Turn off player and restart, there it is again. Cleared listen log, uninstalled and reinstalled, it is still there in yellow. Never had this problem before. Tired of seeing this title always showing up and yes I have listened to it all the way through. Please help fix this.  Additional: I have listened to 8 or 9 episodes past the yellow highlighted one.... and other series. It is stuck on the same one eternally.
replyContent: Email me at sudzdev@gmail.com

content: What a great app! TONS of OTR shows intuitively organized and so easy to search and many customizable options. Worth every cent!

Hi!  Still a wonderful app but is there any way the clear one of the last programs?  For example, I have a Dragnet episode on here and when I want to go to another episode, the Dragnet episode stays there.  Any way that can be fixed?
replyContent: Depending on how you got there, press the next button on the player to play the next show or go to the select menus and pick a different show. The show displayed is saved (per a user request) so you can start back up at that point. Also, tapping the the show title will bring you to the location in the show selection menu.

content: There is no better app for old radio programs. Get ready for countless hours of entertainment.  An added bonus is the developers seem genuinely interested in addressing customer concerns.
replyContent: Coming soon

content: As a long time OTR fan and collector having a portable way to listen to these shows is great. I had tried others and had mixed results, this one works great. I have yet to experience any of the problems others have mentioned.  I would like a way to ask for new series to be added, but that is minor.  Would love to see Tarzan, Jungle Jim and more Lone Ranger added, please.  Update. Ask and ye shall receive. Thank you for adding Jungle Jim (great sound quality), I found The Lone Ranger, but I know that there are way more shows available than what you listed here, so if you can find more and list them by year I would give you 6 stars!!!
replyContent: The Lone Ranger can be found in Westerns. I'll look into the others.

content: Just what I was looking for. Extremely happy with all the content.
Excellent.

Like other review, used to love this but it stops and freezes up every 10 to 15 minutes.  Reinstalled, changed preference to persistent player mode, restarted. Still stops.  Use Samsung S8+, no other apps do this.
replyContent: I've added a few more attempts to correct this in v4.20. It's a tough one to fix as none of my devices exhibit this issue.

content: Great app, but it would be convenient if you could download a whole series at a time. It is so time consuming downloading the large series. If you could download a series or download the aditional new programs easily to a present series I would give it a 5.
Great job fixing this app!
replyContent: Good to hear it is working for you again.

content: For such a small investment, you get a vast sum of programs. That said, there are some glitches. However, the developer is quick to come up with fixes. As another user noted, the continuous play does not always work correctly. I am using a Galaxy 6  and in preferences put continuous play and with the time bar. It will play a program, then another. I noticed the time bar disappears and it will not play another program. Still, 5 stars fir the library and features.
Works good
replyContent: I believe this has been corrected.

content: DO NOT BUY THIS APP. I paid for this app and soon discovered many issues that simply can't be ignored. Unlike almost all radio show apps including free ones you CANNOT play shows you download on any other player except the app itself and the app doesn't let you create custom playlists. The files are in an unrecognizable format so you CANNOT convert to mp3 or play in other music players that support custom playlists and wireless controls. I listen to these at night before bed and with this app I have to get out of bed every 24 min after show ends and manually select a new show I spoke with devs in length about these issues and they made clear they are not interested in having people be able to listen to the shows any other way than through their app. This is the only app of its kind like this. The app itself is full of glitches and constantly stops playing regardless what device you use (I've tried 5 different ones galaxy s7 , galaxy s2 and s3 tab sony m4 aqua and the newest LG phone none make any difference. Downloading instead of streaming does not help and limits customizability even further than the strict limitations you get to begin with. worst app ever and extremely rude devs if you try asking for any changes don't waste your money
replyContent: There have been a fair amount of user requested changes that have been implemented over the years that I believed would be worthwhile improvements. This one in particular doesn't add anything to the user experience. It actually allows you to NOT use the app. The owner of this review was given the secret decoder so he can now download play the files

content: How do I get my money back? Updated, now can't see name of show, and stops halfway through.
replyContent: As the update note mentioned, try using persistent mode (selected in Preferences) if the shows don't play all the way through. I believe this issue has been corrected in the last update.

content: Works beautifully on both my HTC and my older Samsung. Amazing number of shows.
I have this app on my phone and tablet. Best .99 I have ever spent. Super selection and like the ability to download for later use. Thank you

I absolutely love this app! I've had it for several years and use it more than any other app. When I get a new phone this is the first thing I install. I now have my wife hooked on it as well. At bedtime the big discussion is always which show should we listen to! Any chance of getting some Harry Niles? Just now reinstalling the newest edition as advised. I can't wait to play with it! Thanks for all the hard work!!!

Overall, a great app. One critique so far: CBS Radio Mystery Theatre has over 1,200 episodes. Am I missing something or do you actually have to scroll clear through over a thousand episodes whenever you want the later episodes? The free app on my phone has each year`s episodes you can click on to get there quickly. Don`t see that option on this tablet/paid version. Please tell me there`s a quicker way to get to the 1,211th episode other than having to scroll through 7 years of episodes!
replyContent: You're right. That series is somewhat unwieldy. I'll split them up by year in the next content update.

content: This app is my favorite but the last week it's very glitchy. I tried a uninstall and reinstall no help. I am using a Stock Note 7. Paid version .
replyContent: I believe this has been corrected in the latest update. The current version is 4.12.

content: Almost Perfect! I love the selection of shows. Couldn't live without it.
Stops and doesn't act  right.
replyContent: I believe this has been corrected in the latest update

content: I have to say this is one of my favorite apps. The Fallout game series and satellite radio really got me into golden age music and shows, with a fondness for detective, horror and some of the comedies like Jack Benny, Fibber McGee and The Great Gildersleeve. This station has them all. One of the best purchases I've made. Now if I could just figure out how to display the content list below the play bar like that one picture shows.  Incredible job!!!
replyContent: The content list below the play bar is available when running the app on a tablet. Things get kind of cramped on phones.

content: Great app love that some of these are still around and accessible.

Thank you Tech People for the quick response, it is nice to see people actually there and paying attention to their apps. I love love love this app and listen every night to a show to fall asleep. Best money I spent on buying and app. Again guys thank you for this great app
replyContent: What you are seeing is the notification from a service that has always been part of the app.  If you exit the app by pressing the back button (where it says Press Back Again to Exit), it will remove the notification. It may still show as running if you look at Setup/Apps but that's an Android thing to speed up the next launch.

content: Great old time app!!
Best OTR app there is, period

I have had this app for over two years fully paid version..for some reason the shows start but stop a few minutes into the shows...gets quite annoying..will try uninstall and reinstall yet again...please fix this issue as I love this app and use it all the time....when it works..and yet again the uninstall reinstall did nothing to cure problems...PLEASE FIX!
replyContent: As you've had it for so long, is it something that just started or has it been an issue for the past 2 years? I know certain users are seeing this but I haven't been able to reproduce it so fixing it has been a problem. E-mail me directly at sudzdev@gmail.com

content: (Chomp choke  chomp CHOKE) excuse me I am taking my foot out of my mouth so can eat this (GAG)  CROW...  WHEN I WROTE THAT AWFUL REVIEW ON THE OTR LITE. I DIDNT THE REALIZE THE FULL VERSION  OF GOLDEN AGE OF RADIO WAS DOWN THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE..  THIS PROGRAM  HAS THE MOST AUDIO CONTENT EVER.. WITH THE MOST CONTENT (28000 AND COUNTING),  THERE NO EVER AND I MEAN ABSOLUTELY NO DEVELOPER  AN BEAT THIS APP. THANK YOU THANK YOU. T H A N K.  Y O U!!!!! FOR PROVIDING SUCH A VAST AMOUNT OF AUDIO CONTENT.  ON JUNE SIX I SPENT THE ENTIRE DAY  LISTENING TO THE D-DAY BROADCAST  IF YOU CAN SEE YOUR WAY TO ADD BROADCAST OF NOVEMBER 22 1963 IT WOULD SUCH A BLESSING...   AGAIN PLEASE THE BAD REVIEW AGAIN THANK YOU
replyContent: That review did throw me for a loop but for full disclosure, Google removed the paid app that week because they thought there was a copyright issue with the shows. I appealed saying OTR is in the public domain and they reinstated the app. We're good, bro.

content: WOW! Totally amazed at the shows available, (referring to the full version). Sound quality for the most part is outstanding. I rate app this as A+   Now what should I do with all my OTR CDs?

Still a good app, but technically not as good as it was. Has the best OTR library that I've found. Have trouble with the continuous play working properly and sometimes starts mid program. Have switched to other otr apps.
replyContent: I've been looking into this for a while now but, unfortunately, I can't duplicate the issue so I'm having trouble coming up with a solution. I'll keep at it.

content: Great content. Having issues on continues play. It will skip the end on the episode to get to the next....I'm sure they will address it.
replyContent: I've been looking into this for a while now but, unfortunately, I can't duplicate the issue so I'm having trouble coming up with a solution.

content: So many titles and remarkable quality on the audio for the most part...  One suggestion I have is for the menu navigation.  Have the back button go back to the previous page instead of the main menu. Otherwise,  great job!
replyContent: You can use the genre and series buttons to back out. I know it seems counter-intuitive but there is an underlying reason with the way the program flows where the back button won't work in this case.

content: I am an avid OTR fan, have been for years. This app has a lot of variety of categories & an amazing amount of shows. I have used other apps,  this is by far the best. Thanks to the administration for all of their hard work.
I think its great to listen to at night ðŸŒˆ
Great OTR app, big selection of shows.

This would be a great app, but I have had to uninstall it twice in an attempt to fix it, while listening to several programs this app has skipped several episodes of different shows, it will skip about 20 episodes before playing.
replyContent: Links move and servers go down. With over 28.5K shows, I rely on the users to report broken links so I can check/correct them. Send the broken link info from the menu. Slow internet connections can also cause timeouts when starting to stream so the app skips to the next show.

content: I've had this app before and it's worked fine on a number of devices but now for whatever reason it will not open. It gives me an error message saying it can't access the database. Really disappointed because I do truly love this app.
replyContent: I believe this issue has been corrected.

content: This is the only app I use EVERY SINGLE DAY..thanks for bringing it.. can you get some Bob Hope shows? Thank you so much. I am amazed at the response. I listened to Bob Hope last night. Thank you very much.. UPDATE: Still listening to this app everyday.. I love this.. keep it up.. you are the greatest... is there anymore game shows avail? Like you bet your life? Thanks again my friend...
replyContent: There are now some Bob Hope shows in the latest update!

content: This apps is the best. Clear reception & great variety. Been the best I ever downloaded. Hours of enjoyment.

This app seems to have every radio show accessible. My only real complaint is the user interface is a little difficult to maneuver, especially with no clear buttons, but it doesn't really matter: I can still use the app just fine.
replyContent: For your device, the interface should look similar to the top and bottom picture when in portrait mode and the side by side picture in landscape. Which buttons are missing?

content: Would give it 5 stars but having an issue with continuous play not working properly.  At end of 1 show starts next show right at the end .. Etc etc till end of series.  Please fix
replyContent: Unfortunately, I can't re-produce the problem. Please contact the developer at SudzDev@gmail.com so I can get some more information to correct your issue.

content: Where can I begin but with the app itself? Easy to navigate. Incredible catalogue of broadcasts. I would also like to say the dev is really awesome for having responded right away - there is not a single negative thing I could think to say. The full version is definitely worth it. Very few apps have I ever actually said, I am indescribably happy I bought - this is one. Anyone who wants a good old time radio app - this is the best hands down! Thanks again.
replyContent: Missed that one.  Fixed in version 3.41.

content: Thank you for fixing the CBSRMT thing before I could even send you an email to let you know. Fine service. Thank you.

This is by far the best old radio show app available.  It has the most shows and is easy to navigate.  The developer is quick to respond to requests for new shows and any concerns.  I highly recommend it!
Fantastic selection. Will change to five stars once you add My Favorite Husband  EDIT: Missed it the first time, thanks!
replyContent: It's already there. Check the Comedy genre.

content: Cannot seem to get to the end of an act cap off very bad audio
replyContent: Not sure what "act cap off" is. Bad auto-correct? Are using Wi-Fi or Cell data? The audio quality is subject to the original source and how it was encoded. Some audio is better than others. Which shows are you having issues with? E-mail the developer with further info,

content: A very good application with great variety, I love old time radio and this might be the best application out there. A big plus is the responsive developer who replies to emails and works on issues,
So much better than Old Time Radio Player. Smooth playback with lots of great shows from the past. Because I'm able to download shows, I can save them for later. The sleep timer is a great bonus!
Deleting
Great because you can save shows, and constantly updates with new content
How do i download the shows so I can listen when I don't have Internet or cell reception? I don't see an option
replyContent: Long pressing the show title will bring up the dialog to download the show. Review the help screen that describes this and the other options available.

content: This is soooo much fun! I love the horror, SciFi, and mystery shows!!! Updated: I really appreciate that this app is still getting updated. I enjoy listening to these old shows so much! They're new to me! Thank you for a fantastic and truly fun app!!!

Only thing missing is the 12/16/1941 episode of fibber mcgee and molly "fibber cuts down his own christmas tree". Otherwise, the best variety and quality of old radio you can find. Easily worth the $0.99
replyContent: It's been added to the latest content update.

content: Looking for a huge variety of old time radio look no further. Great app.  Had an issue with a few links so I emailed the developer and they fixed no prob. I've been using this app for a long time now. Tried others but this one blows the competition out if the water.
I was excited to get this. However, I had to restart each show more than once. I am really disappointed.
replyContent: If you could supply a little more information, I'd like to try and fix the issue. Please email the details.

content: This is The Best application of them all

Everything is such great quality and there is so much available! Totally worth the money. It's an excellent way to keep myself from being lonely when I'm left by myself and is a great way to calm down after overdosing on horror stories...thank you so much for this!!
Please add Sam Spade episodes to the detectives genre.
replyContent: Done!

content: Great app with alot of variety.  I would love to see the show 10-4-2 Time show up on the music list.
replyContent: Coming soon!

content: Having issues with getting latest update to install. Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.  Also would Life with Luigi be a possibility on next update?
replyContent:
If it is error 963 which was what another user reported, this is a Google error with the Play Store and, I believe, is a known issue that they are currently working on. I'll look into a work around. 

Try the following: http://www.fixerrs.com/2015/07/google-play-store-error-963.html

Another user also said that "it fixed itself"

content: Great app that I forgot I purchased and was uninstalled by me in the past; found it again in my "paid apps" and it was like finding a present! I took a scroll through the "Series" list and I am blown away at the amount of series avail, and many I'd not heard of. Listened to some and I found many I love. This app is a must-have for any OTR fan, as it has all the usual faves & some great lesser known shows, neat UI and it's easy to navigate. Love this!
replyContent: I'm glad you came back!

content: I can't praise this app enough. It provides the best selection of programs and the best features of any OTR app available. Even better, the app is definitely not stagnant. It's constantly being updated with more programs and features. I requested a feature and next thing I knew, there it was. I've tried almost every OTR app in the store, and believe me, save yourself some time and just download this one. It's the only one worth keeping. It's the only one worth paying for. Excellent!
Error code 963, Bought now can not install?????
replyContent:
This is a Google error with the Play Store and, I believe, is a known issue that they are currently working on. I'll look into a work around.

Try the following:
http://www.fixerrs.com/2015/07/google-play-store-error-963.html

content: How about adding nero wolfe cbc 1982 please
replyContent: A great series. Let me look into it.

content: Great selection.  Great quality.  Awesome OTR!   3/18:  suddenly getting an error message every time.  Haven't been able to use in nearly 2 weeks!  Please fix.  I paid for this app.  3/18 update (second) - working again!  back to 5 stars!
Thank you.
replyContent: I was able to reproduce the error and updated the app. Give it a try.

content: There are many programs that I can listen to that I have loved for many years. After I found out that it has Chromecast, I tried it on my TV and it was wonderful. Was able to lay back to do stuff in my chair while listening from my TV.
Fantastic!
Best app for old radio shows
Bought the app but I have no shows. It gives no lists of series or genres.
replyContent: You have to update the content. Go to the menu and select Refresh Content. It will load over 20,000 shows! When the app is first run, a pop-up "should" come up stating you need to load the content file.

content: I  Absolutely  Love  This App My Favorite  Program To  Listen   Is   The  Jack  Benny  Program  I Was wondering    Will You  Be Adding  My Favorite  Husband  To The  List  Of  Programs Anytime Soon?  I Highly  Recommend   This To  Everyone  It's  Fantastic    â˜º
replyContent: Thanks for your comments. I'll add My Favorite Husband to the next content update in a few days.

content: Nice app. It is worth buying for OTR lovers. Sound quality is very good. Variety is excellent. I have yet to have any issues at all.
I love this app. The only problem is when I download a show, I can't find it in my phone folders.
replyContent: The downloaded shows are meant to be played through the app by design. You won't see them in the media listing for your other audio apps.

content: Old radio shows 1930's to 1970's.

It saddens me that these OTR apps don't get me paid downloads. So much magic in these old shows. Yes you can get them for free but the time it takes to download & organize all of these shows into a single app.... Priceless. Thanks developer for your hard work. Gladly paid for this.
Why are all episodes of baby snooks only 10 minutes long what happened to the rest of the show please fix this.
replyContent:
The shows prior to 1944 were from when the Baby Snooks character was part of other programs.

In 1944, Fanny Brice got her own show. From what I've read, there are not a lot of these shows available.

I have added some more shows that are from the later series. Refresh the content and scroll to the bottom of the list to listen to them.

content: This app has a great selection radio  shows from 1940 through 1960. All my favorites - its my go to app for entertainment.
This is a great OTR app. You can stream or download the episodes. The developer responds very quickly to questions or suggestions. This is one of the best of is type. Thanks Tom!
